interactivity.requirements: 45 Chika Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Heart of Gold " from Tsubasa Tsukioka
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Chika at the Dorms after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Chika invites Sensei into her dorm so the two of them can make a decision regarding the future of their relationship.
trivia: There is a minor addition to the dialogue if the player chooses Yumi and when the event happens on a Monday.
Tsubasa is only available as an option if the event Mating Season was seen.
Chinami is only available if you chose to see Chinami in the bath in The Gap in the Door

changelog: This Event was added in Update .30.0.
